abstract: The owners of Ninth Street Espresso, Summit Bar and Motorino have joined forces.
snippet: The owners of Ninth Street Espresso, Summit Bar and Motorino have joined forces.
lead_paragraph: The owners of of Summit Bar and Ninth Street Espresso have joined forces, with a helping hand from Motorino's Mathieu Palombino, to open Prima in the East Village on Wednesday.

headline.main: Coffee, Cocktails and Meals in Between at Prima
